name: Brampton Flight Centre
about: Brampton Flight Centre, established in 1946, is a world-class flight training facility internationally respected for its excellence in aviation education. With over 50,000 pilots trained, it offers a comprehensive Professional Pilot Diploma Program that can be completed in 12-14 months. The centre boasts a modern fleet of 24 aircraft, including Cessna 172s, Piper Seminoles, and a Piper Seneca, along with a Level 2 Frasca TruFlite Flight Training Device. It is Transport Canada approved and a member of the Air Transport Association of Canada (ATAC). The centre owns its own airport, providing students with ample flying opportunities in both controlled and uncontrolled airspace. Facilities include a restaurant, maintenance shop, and full-service fueling, ensuring a supportive and well-equipped learning environment. Brampton Flight Centre is dedicated to safety, security, and excellence in aviation education, making it a premier choice for aspiring pilots.
